wikipedia_page.main: William Charles Cox (born 27 November 1901 – 1978) was a footballer who played as a left back, centre half or left half for Southend United and West Ham United in the Football League. He also played for Glico Works and Ilford.

link_mentions.page: List of West Ham United F.C. players

response: Charles or Charlie Cox may refer to:
*Charlie Cox (racing driver) (born 1960), Australia motor racing commentator
